Package UI.Controllers

Class ProductController

  • java.lang.Object
    • UI.Controllers.ProductController
  • public class ProductController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller for the product form.
    Author:
    David Brungardt

        public ProductController()

    • Method Detail

      • setInventory

        public void setInventory​(Inventory inventory)
        This method passes the inventory from the main form into the controller for the part form.
        Parameters:
        inventory - The inventory we are adding products to (static from main form).

      • setHomeController

        public void setHomeController​(Controller controller)
        This method passes the controller from the main form into the controller for the product form. Passing the main form controller into this controller will allow us to update tables in the main form.
        Parameters:
        controller - The main form's controller, used to pass back information.

      • setProductToModify

        public void setProductToModify​(Product product)
        If we are modifying a product, this method is used to pass that product into the controller.
        Parameters:
        product - The product we are going to modify (only used when modifying product).

      • setModifyProducts

        public void setModifyProducts​(boolean modifyProduct)
        Method responsible for defining whether or not we are adding a new product or modifying an existing product.
        Parameters:
        modifyProduct - A boolean value that indicates if we are modifying products, (false for adding new product).

      • inputIsValid

        private boolean inputIsValid()
        Method used for validating input on the form.
        Returns:
        True if form input is valid, false if input is invalid.

      • inventoryIsValid

        private boolean inventoryIsValid​(boolean inputIsValid)
        Method used for validating inventory data.
        Parameters:
        inputIsValid - A boolean indicating if the form input was valid.
        Returns:
        True if form inventory data is valid, false if inventory data is invalid.

      • handleSearchParts

        public void handleSearchParts()
        Searches for part in table. If ID cannot be parsed, searches for part by name.

      • updateParts

        public void updateParts()
        Updates parts in table based on parts in inventory.

      • updateAssociatedParts

        public void updateAssociatedParts()
        Updates parts in table based on parts associated with product.

      • handleAddParts

        public void handleAddParts()
        Adds selected part to product and updates table for associated parts.

      • getPartToModify

        public Part getPartToModify​(javafx.scene.control.TableView tableView)
        This method gets the selected part from the table on the form.
        Parameters:
        tableView - Takes in a tableview for input, returns selected part (if any).
        Returns:
        Returns the selected part if one is selected, otherwise returns null.

      • handleRemoveAssociatedPart

        public void handleRemoveAssociatedPart()
        Removes part association with product and removes from product part table. Asks for confirmation before removing part.

      • handleSaveProduct

        public void handleSaveProduct()
        Saves changes to the product, closes product form and updates product table in main form.

      • handleCancel

        void handleCancel()
        Handles cancellation of product creation by closing the form.

      • handleOnMouseClicked

        private void handleOnMouseClicked​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Removes selection from part tables when form is clicked.
        Parameters:
        event - Takes in a mouse click event.
